trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of tick marks in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> control with respect to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> that the control implements.
trans-unit.target: Specifica la posizione dei segni di spunta in un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> rispetto al controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />, che viene implementato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement> enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement> enumerazione viene utilizzata per impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that has tick marks that are located below the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: La figura seguente mostra un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> con segni di graduazione che si trovano di sotto di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property is set to BottomRight.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> è impostata su BottomRight.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> proprietà per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear above and below the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> bar for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or to the left and right of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: I segni di spunta appaiono sopra e sotto la barra del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> per un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> orizzontale, mentre appaiono a sinistra e a destra del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> per un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> verticale.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear below the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or to the right of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: I segni di spunta appaiono sotto il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> per un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> orizzontale, mentre appaiono a destra del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> per un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> verticale.
Non vengono visualizzati segni di graduazione.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear above the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or to the left of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: I segni di spunta appaiono sopra il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> per un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> orizzontale, mentre appaiono a sinistra del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> per un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> verticale.
